    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(int number,
    int capacity)
        Creates a new Room with the given room number and capacity.
        Parameters:
        number - The number of the room as an int.
        capacity - The capacity of the room as an int. This capacity ranges from 1 (single) to 3 (triple).

    • Method Detail

      • getNumber

        public int getNumber()
        Returns the number of the room as an int.
        Returns:
        The number of the room as an int.

      • getBookingID

        public int getBookingID(java.lang.String month,
               int startDate)
        Returns the booking ID at a given date. If there is no booking on that date, 0 is returned.
        Parameters:
        month - The month that the booking occurs in.
        startDate - The date that the booking begins on.
        Returns:

      • makeNewBooking

        public void makeNewBooking(int bookingID,
                  java.lang.String month,
                  int startDate,
                  int duration)
        Makes a new booking in this Room starting from the given date for the given duration.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking as an int.
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter string.
        startDate - The date the booking begins as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking as an int.

      • cancelBooking

        public void cancelBooking(int bookingID)
        Cancels the booking in this room with the given booking ID.
        Parameters:
        bookingID - The ID of the booking to cancel.

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()
        Returns the capacity of the room as an int.
        Returns:
        the capacity of the room as an int. This capacity ranges from 1 (single) to 3 (triple).

      • printBookings

        public void printBookings()
        Prints the bookings in a room in the format " 3LetterMonth startDate duration", e.g. " Jan 1 1".

      • isRoomAvailable

        public boolean isRoomAvailable(java.lang.String month,
                      int startDate,
                      int duration)
        Returns a boolean indicating where the room is available during the given dates.
        Parameters:
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter string.
        startDate - The date the booking begins as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking in days as an int.
        Returns:
        true if room is available and false if not.

      • isRoomChangeAvailable

        public boolean isRoomChangeAvailable(java.lang.String month,
                            int startDate,
                            int duration,
                            int bookingID)
        Returns a boolean indicating where the room is available during the given dates. Ignores any bookings with the given booking ID.
        Parameters:
        month - The month of the booking as a 3-letter string.
        startDate - The date the booking begins as an int.
        duration - The length of the booking in days as an int.
        bookingID - The ID of the booking to ignore.
        Returns:
        true if room is available and false if not.
